file_content.text: No way. No damn way.
Kaliyo.
You piece of filth. You come looking for me? Really?
She was one of your crew, right?
She was my wife.
You could say that.
You were supposed to be dead. Get out of here before I make it real.
I came to meet Firebrand. You're the one who's been operating against Zakuul for two years?
What's going on?
I wasn't sure you were still alive. Kaliyo... I don't have the words.
It's really good to see you.
Yeah? I'm guessing you don't have my explosives, either.
Then you are Firebrand?
You have no idea how glad I am you're okay. It's been... it's been a long time.
It's really good to see you.
Yeah. I really miss running around with you, getting shot, hunted down, tossed in jail... those were good days.
How did we spend all that time together without shooting one another?
We never did get along.
Way I remember it? Your bosses brainwashed you, and Bugboy and Ensign Sith-kisser had issues. I was the reliable one.
Why I stuck around, I'll never know.
And now you're "Firebrand"? Anarchist of the Undercity?
Firebrand's what the locals call me to brighten their sad little lives. And you're, what--the scary "Outlander"?
You heard about that.
You got in the news again after ruining the droid factory. Should've been my target, but you had to come out of hiding with a splash.
I wasn't hiding. I was in carbonite until Lana Beniko found me.
Not one of your better lies. And just... sad if it's true.
So what now? You want me back on the team? Toss away what I've got, just to play fascist friend of the Sith Empire?
We need your help against Zakuul.
No.
I realize you weren't expecting this. I wasn't either. But I'm not just walking away. Tell me why.
Talk to me.
What, you want a big hug? Should I be crying to see you safe?
What if I just bought you a drink?
I know this woman very well. She may be more trouble than she's worth.
I'm not sure we need her.
Then why's Zakuul sending so many Skytroopers after her? And why was she looking to buy explosives?
We just saved you from Skytroopers. I'm guessing more are on the way and that they know your face.
Without us, you're dead.
Yeah, well... I wasn't planning on sticking around.
Okay, look. I'm in the middle of something big. You want to tag along, we can talk--you're a half-decent shot.
Agreed. You can explain on the move.
So this Jedi Padawan walks naked into a cantina, spots a Sith sitting at the bar...
I think we all know this one. "Good try, but that's not how you earn a lightsaber."
About five levels down, there's this one Skytrooper. Totally wrong program--likes to give backrubs. Best thing Zakuul ever did.
Well, I know where I'm going next.
You, shut up. You... why do I think you don't have my explosives?
You're Firebrand. The Lady of Sorrows told you about a meet here. I don't have your bombs, but I'm not here to fight.
We're not your enemies.
Well that's all disappointing.
You might be surprised, Firebrand.
You look familiar. You're one of Doc's friends.
Have we met before?
I've known a lot of docs. I've even known a couple of Jedi. Don't read too much into it.
Fascinating as this is--you are Firebrand, right?
You want to put the weapon down and talk.
[Force Persuade] Lower your weapon.
I--ah! Yeah, that hurts.
Little trick: Someone tries to mess with my head, I turn on a pain inducer. And no, you can't see the implant.
You're outnumbered and outgunned. Trust me, you don't want to start shooting.
You can't win this fight.
You have no idea what I want.
Besides explosives.
Fair point.
So you're "Firebrand"? Zakuul's anarchist, wanted for terrorism? I expected more.
You're a disappointment.
If I shoot you, you won't have to worry about it.
If you fire, you'll be dead in seconds.
Aww. Tell you what--no weapons, you and me. Hands and teeth.
Let's tone this down before someone starts selling tickets.
Just "Kaliyo" is fine. Firebrand's what the locals call me to brighten their sad little lives.
And I guess you're the big mean "Outlander"? I heard what you did at the droid factory.
Meltdown, blackouts, dead people everywhere and a whole panicked city. Not bad work. What brings you here?
I suppose after the factory, you're not Zakuul's most wanted anymore. I am.
Jealous of my accomplishments?
What do you want?
Place almost melted down. Would've been more impressive if it had, but the blackout was kind of fun. What brings you here?
One thing you'll learn about me: I don't like it when civilians are caught in the crossfire. My war is against Arcann.
I couldn't endanger innocents.
Oh, yeah? So why are you bothering me?
I'm building an alliance against Arcann. You've got skills and resources I need.
I'm not a good team player.
I want to know how you've operated without being caught. I want to know what you know about the Spire. Then we can discuss further arrangements.
You have resources I want.
Ooh. Threatening and mysterious.
Look, I'm in the middle of something big. You kind of stole my thunder with the factory and you lied about bringing explosives, so that's two points against you.
We also just saved you from Skytroopers.
Yeah, true--and there are more coming, so I could use backup. You want to tag along, we can talk and work.
Like I said, you stole my thunder. Now I'm stealing it back.
I'll leave you to it--there's a contact I need to meet.
First stop is the Old World power junctions. You know how to cold rig a detonator...?
You are Firebrand, right?
What was that?
We have shared interests.
I'm going to need details. But not here.
